A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t get the reason people bash on this movie so much. It’s a Star Wars movie\, and it acts as such. It went into spaces and boundaries no other SW movie had dared to enter\, it took risks\, unlike The Force Awakens. Yes it is not perfect\, but with the plot and story they did follow\, they executed it as well as I could dream for.
